property.name: hive.server2.thrift.port
property.description: Port number of HiveServer2 Thrift interface. Can be overridden by setting $HIVE_SERVER2_THRIFT_PORT. Default: 10000.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.port
property.description: Port number when in HTTP mode. Default: 10001.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.bind.host
property.description: Bind host on which to run the HiveServer2 Thrift interface. Can be overridden by setting $HIVE_SERVER2_THRIFT_BIND_HOST. Default: localhost.

property.name: hive.server2.transport.mode
property.description: Server transport mode. Value can be "binary" or "http". Default: binary.

property.name: hive.server2.enable.doAs
property.description: Setting this property to true will have HiveServer2 execute Hive operations as the user making the calls to it. Default: true.

property.name: hive.zookeeper.client.port
property.description: The port at which the clients will connect
